name: Survive The Test
description:
You are only a stick man and the only think you can do here is to dodge for survive the maximum of time you can.

The box that fall from sky will kill you on air, but after they are on the ground, you can use them as barrier for the missiles.

Nothing stop the laser, but its turned off after some seconds.

The missiles kill you! Try to dodge or stay behind walls of the boxes!

Controls

  • Arrow Keys
